alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 9:57AM EST until January 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In New York, Northeast Suffolk County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Refreezing on some surfaces is possible late this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
